args.title: Monetary Policy Impact on Corporate Investment
args.body:
Here is the analysis of the impact of current monetary policy on corporate investment:

1. Latest Investment Data
2. Monetary Policy Impact Analysis
3. Investment Changes Comparison
4. Future Investment Prediction

Please find the attached file for detailed information.

origin_prompt.content: 我想评估当前的货币政策对企业投资的影响。首先，请获取最新的企业投资数据。然后，分析货币政策调整对企业投资的即时反应。接下来，比较不同货币政策下的企业投资变化。最后，请提供基于分析的企业投资预测。
